title.title: Title
title.description: The title or name of the intangible creation manifested by the identified digital asset

extra.title: Extra
extra.description: Descriptive, industry-sector or use-case specific metadata (used as immutable input for Meta-Code generation). Any text string (including json or json-ld) indicative of the identity of the referent may be used.

filename.title: Filename
filename.description: Filename of the referenced digital asset (automatically used as fallback if no seed_title element is specified)

filesize.title: Filesize
filesize.description: File size of media asset in bytes.

tophash.title: tophash
tophash.description: Blake3 hash over concatenation of metahash and datahash

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: Duration of audio-visual media in secondes.

fps.title: Fps
fps.description: Frames per second of video assets.

width.title: Width
width.description: Width of visual media in pixels.

height.title: Height
height.description: Height of visual media in pixels.

characters.title: Characters
characters.description: Number of text characters (code points after Unicode normalization)

language.title: Language
language.description: Language(s) of content (BCP-47) in weighted order.
